<<<api>>>: String.getBytes()
<<<code>>>: String s = "SYNC";
byte[] bytes = s.getBytes();
System.out.println(bytes);
<<<explanation>>>: To convert a String to a byte array, you can use the getBytes() method of the String class. This method returns a byte array representation of the string. In the given code, the string "SYNC" is converted to a byte array and then printed.
